title: MongoDB
subtitle: Database Creation and Development Course
description: This MongoDB course covers the fundamentals of NoSQL databases, focusing on document-based data storage. You’ll learn how to perform CRUD operations, design schemas, and use MongoDB's powerful asjdjasbjabsd querying capabilities. ajsdjasnjdasdkjba.
objectives: Understand the basics of MongoDB, perform CRUD operations, and design efficient document schemas.ahsdhasbd
welcomeMessage: Welcome to the MongoDB course! Get ready to master one of the most powerful NoSQL databases.

title: Full Stack Developer
subtitle: MERN stack development
description: This MERN Stack course teaches full-stack web development using MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js. You’ll learn to build dynamic, responsive web applications from front-end to back-end, integrating databases, authentication, and APIs.

title: Finance
subtitle: Learn Financial Calculations
description: The Financial Balance Sheet course is designed to introduce you to the key concepts of financial accounting. You will learn how to prepare,masdjbasdjkas analyze, and interpret balance sheets to assess the financial health of a business.asdvhabhajdsaj
objectives: Learn React basics, Components, State management, Hooks

title: Kotlin
subtitle: Learn Android Development from A to Z!
description: This Kotlin course teaches you the fundamentals of programming with Kotlin, focusing on syntax, data types, and key features. You’ll learn how to write clean and efficient Kotlin code for building Android applications and backend services.ahsdbasbdjasdj.
objectives: Understand Kotlin syntax and data types, Learn to work with functions and control flow, Master object-oriented programming concepts in Kotlin, Develop Android applications using Kotlin, Explore Kotlin's features for backend development.

title: C++ Advanced
subtitle: DSA in C++
description: The Advanced C++ course dives deep into object-oriented programming, memory management, and advanced data structures. You’ll explore topics like templates, exception handling, multi-threading, and optimization techniques.

title: Java in Depth
subtitle: Learn A to Z Java for beginners!
description: The Java Course is designed for beginners to learn the fundamentals of Java programming. It covers essential concepts such as data types, variables, control structures, object-oriented programming (OOP), exception handling, and basic file operations.
objectives: Variables & Data Types, Control Flow Statements, Object-Oriented Programming (OOP), Exception Handling, File Handling & I/O Operations
welcomeMessage: Hello Learners! Dive into the world of Java!

title: Java Advanced
subtitle: Advanced Level Java
description: The Java Advanced Course dives deeper into multithreading, collections framework, Java Stream API, networking, JDBC, and design patterns. Learners will explore advanced topics like Spring Boot, Hibernate, microservices architecture, and RESTful API development.
objectives: Multithreading & Concurrency, Collections Framework & Stream API, JDBC & Database Connectivity, Spring Boot & Microservices, RESTful API Development

title: NextJS
subtitle: Build Fast, Modern Web Apps with Next.js: From Static to Full-Stack
description: Next.js is a powerful React framework that enables server-side rendering, static site generation, and optimized performance for web applications. This course covers everything from setting up a Next.js project to deploying a production-ready application. You'll learn about API routes, and integrating third-party services.
objectives: Server-side rendering (SSR) and static site generation (SSG), Dynamic routing and API routes, Data fetching with getServerSideProps and getStaticProps, Authentication and middleware in Next.js, Optimizing performance and deploying Next.js apps

curriculum.title: Client-Side vs Server-Side Rendering (CSR vs SSR)
Static Site Generation (SSG) vs Server-Side Rendering (SSR)

title: MySQL
subtitle: Mastering Relational Databases with MySQL: From Basics to Advanced Queries
description: Dive into the world of structured data with this comprehensive MySQL course. Whether you're a beginner or looking to enhance your SQL skills, this course will guide you through database design, complex queries, joins, stored procedures, indexing, and optimization techniques. Perfect for web developers, data analysts, and backend engineers aiming to master one of the most popular relational database systems.

title: PostgreSQL
subtitle: Efficient Data Management with PostgreSQL: Explore Features Beyond SQL
description: Unlock the power of PostgreSQL — an advanced, open-source relational database. This course covers core concepts like schema design and query building, while also introducing powerful PostgreSQL-specific features such as JSON support, full-text search, and custom functions. Ideal for developers and data professionals seeking both performance and flexibility in database management.

title: Intro to JavaScript
subtitle: Learn JavaScript from scratch
description: Embark on a comprehensive journey through JavaScript with this full-length course designed for both beginners and those looking to enhance their skills. Covering fundamental concepts to advanced topics, this course offers in-depth tutorials, practical examples, and real-world applications to solidify your understanding of JavaScript. Whether you're starting from scratch or aiming to refine your knowledge, this course provides the tools and insights needed to become proficient in JavaScript development.

curriculum.title: Mini Project - Stone Paper Scissor Game
